name: Deep Randomizer
description:
Better play in full screen
Brave hero Circle go underground to save his love - Triangle. In this task he will be helped by a magical artifact - Random Weapon. You have random weapon, that change every time when you use it. You can see his name, description, image and time in left down corner. When time will pass, you lost one life and get another weapon. You target is you beloved - triangle, she is deep underground. AD - walk, W, Space - jump. LMB - use weapon. M - turn off this awful music. Enjoy!
